problem.markdown: 1. Least Count of the inclined tube manometer, inclined at an angle 1 in 10 in mm wg, is ( ) 10 ( ) 0.1 ( ) 100 (x) 1.0 2. By calibrating inclined tube manometer, which of the following errors can be eliminated (x) Error in Alignment ( ) Manual Error ( ) Error due to deviation from specified inclination ( ) Parallax Error 3. Least Count of the Askania Manometer in mm wg, is ( ) 1.0 (x) 0.01 ( ) 0.1 ( ) 0.001 4. The use of Inclined Tube Manometer is to measure ( ) Air velocity (x) Differential Pressure ( ) Air Quantity ( ) Absolute Pressure

2. By calibrating inclined tube manometer, which of the following errors can be eliminated

choicegroup.choice: Error due to deviation from specified inclination
